segments.text: The whole scene feels like a perfect storm brewing in a seemingly tranquil kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman doesn’t even flinch as the flood at her feet grows deeper.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel anger bubbling up at her negligence; how can she not notice her children’s antics?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy looks so proud, hand deep in the cookie jar, while I just want to scream.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the girl, oh sweet girl, just waiting patiently for her share, unaware of the chaos unfolding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their innocent excitement contrasts with the potential for disaster within those walls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden remains unaffected, a stark reminder of normalcy in an abnormal scene.
segments.speaker: PAR
